content:
CNRP: Common Name Resolution How to use ìcommon namesî for resources?

  • draft-popp-cnrp-goals-00.txt

    • define a protocol

      • for browsers & search sites to use
      • for ëname spaceí providers to offer
      • simpler than ësearchí
      • more featureful than ëstring lookupí
    • Implies a service

      • reviews nature of services, revenue & motivation of participants
      • Canít be solved independently of business & social issues
    • Please review & participate
